definition: ritual kneeling to heaven and earth by bride and groom in a old-fashioned wedding ceremony/same as 拜天地

(main) hall/large room for a specific purpose/CL:間|间[jian1]/relationship between cousins etc on the paternal side of a family/of the same clan/classifier for classes, lectures etc/classifier for sets of furniture

sentences.english: Both castles had their own chapels too, which was incredible to see.
sentences.chinese: 两个城堡都有自己的礼拜堂，非常华美。

sentences.english: The building on the lower left is the main chapel.
sentences.chinese: 图示浸信会建于礐石的会址，左下方为该会礼拜堂。

sentences.english: His enemy turned and paraded from the chapel.
sentences.chinese: 他的敌人转身朝着礼拜堂踏步走去。

sentences.english: What happened to the bowl that was in the chapel near the broken oak?
sentences.chinese: 枯橡树附近的小礼拜堂里的金杯除了什么事？

sentences.english: A massacre took place in the chapel.
sentences.chinese: 当年在那礼拜堂里也有过一番屠杀。

sentences.english: It is to be carried to the churchyard in the evening.
sentences.chinese: 要在晚上运到礼拜堂的墓园。

sentences.english: On emerging from the chapel, a well is visible on the left.
sentences.chinese: 从礼拜堂出来，朝左，我们可以看见一口井。

sentences.english: It says the printing house chapel has decided to print this newspaper in this form. Wieczór Wroc?
sentences.chinese: 它说印刷厂礼拜堂决定打印此报纸在此表。

sentences.english: In meeting the bride, her sister is acknowledged cheung Po tsais lover.
sentences.chinese: 就在拜堂之际，娣妹承认是张保仔的情人。

sentences.english: Hold to do obeisance a rites after.
Highlord Tirion Fordring: Your master knows what lies beneath the chapel.
sentences.chinese: 你的主人知道这礼拜堂之下是什么。

sentences.english: This is Chigi Chapel, Bernini finished the job begun by Raphael.
sentences.chinese: 由拉菲尔开始，而贝尼尼完成的小礼拜堂。

sentences.english: He liked to go to Saint-Medard, which is the nearest church.
sentences.chinese: 他经常去圣美达教堂，那是离家最近的礼拜堂。

sentences.english: In the chapel you can listen to the nuns chanting their prayers.
sentences.chinese: 礼拜堂里，你会听到修女们吟颂着祷文。

sentences.english: He stepped toward the metal grating at the chapel’s entrance.
sentences.chinese: 他朝着礼拜堂的金属槅门入口走去。

sentences.english: Dharma Cave and the Saint's Chapel are the only structures left which were built in seventh century.
sentences.chinese: 法王洞和圣礼拜堂是唯一的结构左边是建于7世纪。

definition: to worship heaven and earth/ritual kneeling by bride and groom in a old-fashioned wedding ceremony/also called 拜堂
(of a child bride) to consummate marriage
bridal room and ornamented candles/wedding festivities (idiom)
variant of 定親|定亲[ding4 qin1]
to send the betrothal gifts/(fig.) to conclude a marriage
(of the groom's family) to send a bridal sedan chair 花轎|花轿 to fetch the bride/to send a party to escort the bride to the groom's house
palanquin with eight carriers/(fig.) lavish treatment
